address.title: Address of the controller
address.description: It's important that the controller is always reachable under this IP address or domain name, otherwise the integration will break. Either configure your router to always assign the same IP to this device over DHCP, or configure the controller to use a fixed IP instead of using DHCP.

errors.ENOTFOUND: IP or domain does not exist.
errors.ECONNREFUSED: Connection was refused - maybe not an iCON controller?
